name: Greedmonger the Ghoulish Driller
response: Ah, there you have it—Greedmonger the Ghoulish Driller! This greasy, oil-stained menace is a true environmental disaster in boots. Black gold? More like black greed! This troll lives for the drill, extracting until the land sobs and the skies choke on its noxious fumes. When Insurance comes up, Greedmonger just lets out a low growl, like a cheap car trying not to break down—because who needs safety when you’ve got endless resources? Pharma? Crypto? Pfft, they exist, but that’s all that matters to Greedmonger—it’s a shrug and a scratch. \
